## Data Wrangling

```{r tidy_data}
# Use this R-Chunk to clean & wrangle your data!

Height <- read_excel("Case_Study_05/Height.xlsx", skip = 2)
View(Height)

Height2 = Height[,grepl("_0$", names(Height))]
View(Height2)


Height2 <- Height %>% 
  pivot_longer(c(1810, 1820, 1830, 1840, 1850, 1860, 1870, 1880, `1890`, `1900`, `1910`, `1920`, `1930`, `1940`, `1950`, `1960`, `1970`, `1980`, `1990`), names_to = "year_decade", values_to "height.cm")

View(Height2)
  
     
```
